game.name: Iced Land Adventure
game.description:
Join Iced Land Adventure and forget all the adventurous challenges you have ever tried! Do not believe on my words? Give this brand new jumping game a try and get ready to face off the deadly challenges! It includes some really highly exciting and complex levels that require putting your quick reflexes abilities to the test. We would say that you should not miss out this unique challenge if you are a die-hard fan of platform games. Many funny animal enemies and beautiful pictures are waiting for you. 

When you click the play button, you would be directed to an exclusively beautiful iced land that is full of deadly obstacles and coin treasures. Your objective in this cute html5 platform game is to grab as many coins as possible and find out the keys to open up the exit game. It will be important to defeat all the dangerous enemies to complete all levels successfully. Move or attack your character using the mouse or use the icons shown on the screen in this adventure platformer challenge!

Get ready to meet multiple dangerous enemies before reaching at the end door! You would have three lives to use in this cute mobile game. Make your character jump over the enemies timely to save your character! Defeat them by clicking the hit button and prove yourself a true fighter! In case of seeking more thrill and entertainment, you can move towards our extensive collection of action games for boys that are also free to play online, no download required. Have a good day, friends!!

game.metaDesc: Play the online free game Iced Land Adventure at atmegame.com ! We have selected this Platform games for best excitement and thrill in you!
